website_summaries.verdict: Quick-charging repellers with a vast coverage area suitable for warding off rodents and burrowing animals.
pros: Very effective if placed right on top of or next to burrower tunnels
Sound is audible but not annoying
cons: Not effective against all critters or infestations

customer_reviews.title: It now looks like a battlefield with mole tunnels all around the four ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely worthless. I inserted one of these at the end of a new mole tunnel after fully charging it. The next day the mole dug right around the unit and continued on as if nothing was amiss. I put all four units in a row about 20' apart in hopes of deterring the moles from any further digging in my yard. It now looks like a battlefield with mole tunnels all around the four units. This is a total waste of money and I am very disappointed in the honesty of the people that were giving this a five star rating. Makes me wonder if those ratings are all fabricated.
customer_reviews.author: BigT1955

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work AT ALL. And it makes an annoying high pitched beep every 60 seconds or so. Meant to deter the pest, but it is audible from quite a distance and very annoying. I bought THREE for my 3/4 acre property (should never have needed that many) and I've still got the same amount of gophers. No difference whatsoever. Don't waste your money or effort on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Layla S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help our situation
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for us. Still have tons of moles :( Even though solar powered, two never worked.
customer_reviews.author: CBRive

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working !
customer_reviews.text: I installed 2 about 20 ft apart in a very active area and after 2 weeks can see there is no more activity. Best part ... once they are installed you don't have to worry about rain , sprinklers , etc. The sun will recharge as needed. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Big Swing and  Miss!
customer_reviews.text: So we are in a battle with a dozen rats that are raiding the chicken coop for easy dinner. We bought all sorts of assorted traps and repellers, and thought we'd try this Ultrasonic Pest Repeller. First off, not sure how ultrasonic it truly is. Both my wife and I can clearly hear the sound that cycles on and off every 15-20 seconds. Secondly, after placing 3 of these units at various locations around the chicken coop, I've actually seen rats run right next to the unit without any hesitation. Save your money and buy something that really works--I'll let you know when I discover it!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for snakes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the 4 packs to cover my 1 1/2 acre lot under the impression that it would help to deter snakes as well as moles. However, it does NOT work for snakes, found a large black snack laying right next to one of the sonic senca's and yes it was working and you could hear the hum from it..as for working on the moles, I haven't seen any new evidence that they are still around so only time will tell on that one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, they don't work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these things to work so badly! I've seen electronic bat repellers work great, but unfortunately, my mole makes new runs within inches of these things. I bought 4 of them 2 full months ago. My yard is not very big so two repellers are quite close together. Didn't make any difference. I've finally resorted to calling in a professional exterminator. PS If you decide to try these repellers be aware that each repeller puts out a little beep every minute or so, which would be annoying if you spend a lot of time near where the repellers are placed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: No moles yet. Don’t leave outside in snow-
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use- installed 2 wks ago. they are actively working bc you can hear humming intermittently when you are outside. I gave 4 stars bc I cannot confirm if they work. I caught 4 moles prior to the arrival of product over 2 months time. It’s been 5 weeks now since last mole. I also cemented two outsodoor holes. Hopefully mole be gone!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lee

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We were being overrun by gophers as soon as the snow melted. They were everywhere (or it seemed), nothing we did scared them away (no gophers were harmed). Within days of putting these around the garden, we noticed fewer gophers and now that they have been in use for just over a week we have only seen 2 or 3 gophers. We would definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Resue

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I had a area of chipmunk holes and tunnels in my backyard. I put one spike into the ground in the center of the holes about 3 weeks ago. I have seen no evidence that the holes are being used anymore as grass clippings, etc have accumulated in the holes. The spike is all the way into the ground as far as it can go and I can mow over it with no problems. I can still hear it working. I only gave it 4 stars for value as I had to buy a four-pack. I have three unused spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rohla

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel diggers gone in 1 day!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly, other than the one that stopped working. We had tunnels everywhere in our backyard grass and garden. We collapsed all the tunnels and put these in about 25 feet apart. Since then, not one tunnel has been created other than when one stopped working. We moved a working one into that stop and once again, the critter left. They do make a bit of a buzzing sound when transmitting, but you get used to it. We have kids and pets so we needed a safe option for critter removal.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is much better alternative to nasty smelling products for the yard. We live on a lake, and we don't want those products running into the water supply. These little things DO emit a "beep", which bothered two of my dogs. It sounds like their perimeter collar barrier warning! So I moved them out a little bit. Problem solved. The transmission distance is impressive. But of course, I'd have to ask a snake how far away he could detect it!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good quality
customer_reviews.text: product looks like they are well made. Just started to use, will see if they work and more importantly, are they durable in the long run. I purchased 4 others from another mfgr, they are not quality made and one failed in the first 2 weeks. Hope that is not the case with these. they look like they are better made--time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Pballman

customer_reviews.title: We have had one mole create a hill since i put these in the ground...
customer_reviews.text: But I found out it was my mistake...I had pulled it out and turned it off to relocate it, slightly, but forgot to turn it back on when I reinstalled it. These things work! We had 3 molehills erupt in a week's time and then none (except for my faux pas) since. Great stuff and I don't have to deal with disposing of carcasses.
customer_reviews.author: Crotchety customer

customer_reviews.title: I also placed him over the actual mole tunnels which I think makes it more effective.
customer_reviews.text: Product came as ordered and I even ordered another set of sonic disruptors and hopefully it will work and it seem to chase them out of the yard thus far yay those pesky little mole
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dennis A. Boysen

customer_reviews.title: Sound waves = Jumbo rats
customer_reviews.text: Well...To start, we still have the occasional rats as normal, but we now have these super enormous, what you would call jumbo size rats. We thinks the sound waves have increased there cell reproduction, which has made them somehow 4x the normal size/amount. It’s like having a constant party under the shed, like fight club but for rats and the whole neighborhood is now involved. So I would not recommend these. That’s it. I was generous on the 2nd star because they look very fancy and useful, which they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Stops the moles!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. This is the second set we have ordered. Since we have a huge problem with moles, these really help with the situation!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Voles be gone!!
customer_reviews.text: My backyard was almost ruined by voles. My dog tore up everywhere to get at them. My yardman kept tripping over mounded grass. I bought this 4 pack, placed 1 at one side of my yard and another at the other end, approximately 150’ away. In less than a week, my dog stopped digging up the yard and they were all gone (probably in my neighbor’s yard)! Moisture has gotten inside where the electronics are located and 3 of the 4 have stopped working. They make a pulsating high frequency sound. I would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Archibald

customer_reviews.title: No effect seen in 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: It has been 2 weeks since I places these devices in my yard and I see no effect. The moles create new holes in my lawn every night. The instructions say you may see an increase in mole activity initially. How long is the "initial" period? I was so excited about this but now disappointed. I keep spending money and see no relief from the moles.
customer_reviews.author: Lora E.

customer_reviews.title: These work but it takes time
customer_reviews.text: Give it 3 weeks. Works on moles, voles, chipmunks,squirrels, and, I think, rabbits. It just takes some time. Make sure they are deep enough and get plenty of sun. I also suggest you remove them for wintertime.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bad idea.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big mistake! It called in rodents! I didn’t have problems with mice before, I installed these retardants to stop Any and All critters like Snakes, now I have mice problems! Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Johnson Miller

customer_reviews.title: Rodent repellent
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to work exactly as depicted. I was having the beginnings of a vole infestation and within days of inserting these devices, they were nowhere to be seen !
customer_reviews.author: tabbooma

customer_reviews.title: I don't know yet.
customer_reviews.text: I am not ready to review it yet . they have not done well yet. It's ridiculous to put a star on something wen your not ready. I am hope these thins work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Very weak vibrations. Placed next to a mole trail, had no effect. Stopped working after a few weeks entirely. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and requires no batteries
customer_reviews.text: These work great - totally got rid of my yard destroyers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but the gophers keeps digging a month and a half later. They are spaced every fifteen feet and I hear the beeps but no one in the ground seems bothered.
customer_reviews.author: sroskens

customer_reviews.title: Not a long term solution.
customer_reviews.text: These stakes are not effective against gophers after a couple months. I have used these stakes for nine months, and after the initial "warm up" period, and it kept the gophers away for a couple months, and then the gophers started to return. Now I use GopherHawk.
customer_reviews.author: Spectre

customer_reviews.title: Fixed problem!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that jept the goffers away!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Katia SkolTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: I had moles undermining my brick patio. These spikes chased them away. The first time I turned them on and left them for two weeks. The moles came back. Then I left them in for considerably longer and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: EdDE

customer_reviews.title: Had voles. Now I don't.
customer_reviews.text: Voles gone after some time. I didn't pay attention but probably a month total. 2 or 3 weeks in I moved them around to cover any spreading as they try to escape the area. But they're gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They work! My old ones gave out after 3 years. Then the moles were back. Now, with the news ones, they are leaving!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Brown

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT HELP
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 of these in our back yard area and it has not helped a bit. The beeping that goes off drives us nuts but not the animals.... we have gophers, ground squirrels and raccoons and they could care less about these things...total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these actually worked, but they do! Haven't had any moles in our yard since we put them out there! So happy I tried them!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not deter rats
customer_reviews.text: Did not deter rats. Even in conjunction with rat repellent spray, and with all four on a pretty small patio (so spacing wasn’t the issue), the rats still ate all my garden plants. You had one job.
customer_reviews.author: ktolva

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on moles in my yard
customer_reviews.text: They vibrated but either the critters making track are not voles or these voles like the vibration sound. Have been in place for several months with no desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Woods

customer_reviews.title: working so for
customer_reviews.text: Of the units that are working, have already seen movement of the moles...they have left the back yard and moved to the front yard...So, now I have moved one unit to the front in hopes it will help, until the replacement for the non-working unit arrives.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well we were overrun with voles and miles, no more fresh dirt mounds since placing them
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Seavert

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 out of 4 lasted
customer_reviews.text: They do what they ate supposed to do but they do not last very long 2 out of 4 stopped working. They are always in Direct sunlight
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.text: We like it so far. We had Voles in our strawberrys & so far we have gotten rid of them by using this device to bring them out of their berrowers & traps to catch them. We have place the device around the rest of the property to keep them from moving in some where else. By spring we will see if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work against gophers
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all....had four in one raised bed and gopher kept coming back...lost two very large plants...disappointed. had high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: maddy clarke

customer_reviews.title: DONT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: THEY DO NOT WORK AGAINST OUR MOLES!!!!!! Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Parsell

customer_reviews.title: Not with it
customer_reviews.text: Rodents still ate my plants. I literally watched the squirrel go up to it and clear it out while the sound was going off.... SMH
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK - at all
customer_reviews.text: These are a complete waste. Didn't work, at all. Followed instructions exactly. This product is not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I want to make this simple and short This crap doesn’t work. Throwing your money at the Rodent ,you have a better chance of deterring them then using this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Calia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for gophers
customer_reviews.text: Yup that's a gopher hole that popped up right next to the stake, they don't seem the mind the buzzing.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: Not sealed properly, 2 fogged up first rain. And months later I still have mole runs right next to them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim messinger

customer_reviews.title: They didn't help with our problem. Can't blame the product. But still have moles.
customer_reviews.text: I like they were easy to use. What I don't like is they didn't work for the moles in my yard. They dug straight up to it and then around it and kept going.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: Moles are making new runs within 4 feet of these thing. What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it held up better
customer_reviews.text: Used them in the yard and within 4 months 3 of the 4 stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Before we purchased this. We had sign of “tunnels”...patches of elevated dirt throughout our lawn. After using this I have seen less signs of “tunnels”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Moles are laughing at me. Literally mole holes tunnels all around them. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mole distracted
customer_reviews.text: Seems the product is not loud enough and hard to put into the ground, I had to insert it into an existing mole hole.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Neary

customer_reviews.title: They worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after inserting the units into the ground the moles went away. The plastic units are still working fine but I’m concerned that they will not hold up to removing them from ground for winter storage
customer_reviews.author: Bob Friedl

customer_reviews.title: Just need sunshine
customer_reviews.text: The service was great thr product arrived in good condition. I installed them for moles there working great time will tell how good they work. I hope it's that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We had mole holes all over the yard. Within a day of using these, we haven't seen a new hole in weeks. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Work great!!
customer_reviews.text: The product works great and is very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen McCarron

customer_reviews.title: I really like these being solar I don't need to have large ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these being solar I don't need to have large batteries in stock, They easily go into the ground, the top is round and small so it blends in with the plants. It produces a pleasant sound which can be heard when you are close to it. It is doing a great job of keeping the moles and other critters away from the flower gardens. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: susan sears

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it four stars because we just recently received it and have not had time to see how well it works. I will say that after first installation we did see bugs moving away from the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lefevere

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Put them in my yard a few weeks ago, ( had a lot of mole runs, activity) since I installed the activity has stopped no more runs, activity of moles has stopped. Very nice to find a product that really works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: yogibear

product_meta.title: SENCA Upgraded Version Solar Powered Sonic Mole Repellent Rodent Repellent Pest Deterrent, Chaser Mole, Gopher, Vole, Snake Repellent for Outdoor Lawn Garden Yards Pest Control (4)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:4

Our products are developed and tested under highest conditions, being certified by all necessary standards of quality, in order to meet the rigorous expectations of our customers. The selection of our suppliers and manufacturers is based on careful screening processes that guarantee excellent products. We offer 100% refund if you are not satisfied with our product, please contact us before leaving a negative review in attempt to resolve the problem.

Why should you purchase this item?

Senca Solar Sonic repellent offers a poison-free way to drive away moles, gophers, mice, voles, snake and other rodents. Every 30 seconds, sonic pulses penetrate the soil, emitting a penetrating sound which is irritating to moles and gophers who are virtually blind and extremely sensitive to sound and vibrations. This method encourages moles to leave the property, and the solar operated spike continues to discourage return visits.

This repeller could be used during your camping trip to keep unwanted small wild animals away from your tent.

Product Features:

 * Material: ABS plastic
 * Solar Panel : 400Hz ±100 Duty cycle : ≈30 sec.
 * Waterproof: work in any weather condition, rainy or snowy
 * Non-Toxin and unpleasant odor, safe to human, animals, and pets
 * Easy installation, no tools required.
 * No battery need, solar power last up to 5 days

Note: Dig a 8” hole, then insert the device 2-4” above the ground. Leave the repeller out to the sun for 24 hours to be charged before used. After 24hrs turn on the "ON" switch. DO NOT keep product submerged in water, nothing is 100% waterproof. Please remove the device until the water drains.
feature_bullets: SOLAR POWERED: Senca mole repellent is using solar powered to operate. This helps our Earth stay clean and green. With charging rate of just 3-4 hours, and last up to 5-7 days in any weather condition. Effective range is up to 7,500 square feet. And it sends out vibration and sounds every 30 seconds, which will effectively repel snakes moles gophers rodents rats raccoons voles from burrowing your garden, lawn, and yard.

CRUELTY-FREE: Keep your back yard or lovely garden impeccable without having to hurt or kill moles, gophers, voles or mice, with this cruelty-free sonic repeller! The device acts solely based on low-frequency sonic vibrations, not hurting the animals in any way! Unlike similar products on the market, this solar powered rodent repellent is perfectly safe for humans and pets, containing no dangerous chemicals or potentially harmful toxins.

DEPENDABILITY & MAINTENANCE FREE: Since our repellers do not need to be plugged in for any kind of power source, we save you the time, money, and hassle of changing batteries while reaping the benefits of using the earth’s natural power source as energy, with zero maintenance.

WATERPROOF MATERIAL: Our Senca ultrasonic mole repellent is made from high quality of ABS and PC and can withstand all sorts of water splashes. The plastic housing offers weatherproof protection. Choose the best sun location, so the solar panel to can receive the light as directly as possible.

EASY INSTALLATION: No tool needed. Just dig an 8” hole, then insert the device 2-4” above the ground. Leave the repeller out to the sun for 24 hours to be charged before used. It takes 2-4 weeks to see the result, and it is normal to see the mole activity increase on the first few days. Keep your garden, yard, lawn clean and beautiful.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars132 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
